name: S&N Bros
description:
S&N Bro is a horizontal-versioned local coop game with abundant designs of player cooperation. Players will control two different characters with different magnetic pole. They need to work with each other to solve the problems in their journey.

To make our game feel more casual, the whole game is designed in 2D style and every player’s sprite, each level’s blocks and trigger are done in traditional cartoon style. For game’s level, the game sees players passing through many blocks with their own magnetism and across a range of increasingly complex levels. We also adjusted the difficulty of each level and minimize the death penalty to avoid having players become too frustrated to complete the rest of levels.

Control:

Player 1:

Moving:   WASD

Change size:   1/!

Gain Magnet Force:   -_

Player 2:

Moving:  arrow keys

Change size:   +/=

Gain Magnet Force: -_
